price: E convocador de Allah, com Sua permissão, e luzeiro luminoso.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
